content: simple skinny scarf by allena williams this scarf is easy to adjust to your tastes if you like long scarves chain more at the beginning you can probably get 2 skinny scarves out of one skein so make one for you and one for a friend or you may make a wide scarf just for you by repeating the row in order until you re out of yarn materials 1 skein of lion brand homespun yarn - bulky weight 6 oz 185 yds n 13mm hook body of scarf chain 101 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet across 100 sts row 2 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet across row 3 chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet across row 4 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet across row 5 chain 1 single_crochet across weave in all ends and enjoy
